name: The Long Loneliness
description:
"Men like us, Mr. Shelby will always be alone. And what love we get, we will have to pay for."  - Chester Campbell

Yes, I'm a big fan of Peaky Blinders and the character Thomas Shelby. 

Made this game for the #LudumDare48 with the show in the background, rewatching it for the third time.

The Long Loneliness doesn't have a lot of philosophy behind it, but I wanted this game to be something more or less about illusion and this is why I added some of my favorite Quotes about illusion and reality. 

You'll go deeper and deeper, and you'll have to complete each level before the oxygen ends.  The deeper you go, the less oxygen you have. 

Complete all the challenges and enjoy your adventure through a field full of amazing quotes.

COMMANDS: 

Arrow Keys: Movements + Teletransport 

Z: Activate Teletransport mode

X: Shot 

C: Collect
